content: daylily coaster is a cute coaster with a picot edging and delicate lace pattern in the center the pattern is worked in the round starting at the edge and worked towards the center it can be worked in any weight yarn with the corresponding needle size however the yarn usage and the finished measurements will be different from the sample finished measurements diameter 5 5 / 14 cm materials  approximately 55 yds /50 m of fingering weight yarn shown in the sample edge color 22 yds /20 m main color 33 yds /30 m  us 2 / 2 75 mm dpns or circular needle for magic loop  3 0 mm crochet hook for provisional cast on  notions 5 stitch markers & tapestry needle gauge 32 stitches x 40 row in 4 x 4 / 10 cm x 10 cm stockinette stitch
